item.title: [317]How to Permanently Spawn Objects[317]
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“brett0x0, post:27, topic:352471”]Where do i put:

[code] public void appendToGlobalObject(int absx, int absy, int objectid); {
BufferedWriter bw = null;

	try {
		bw = new BufferedWriter(
				new FileWriter("GlobalObjects.txt", true));
		bw.write("               makeGlobalObject("+absx+", "+absy+", "+objectid+", 0, 10);");
		bw.newLine();
		bw.flush();
	} catch (IOException ioe) {
		ioe.printStackTrace();
	} finally {
		if (bw != null) {
			try {
				bw.close();
			} catch (IOException ioe2) {
				sM("Error adding Object!");
			}
		}
	}

}[/code]

I’m getting an error on the compile for this line:

public void appendToGlobalObject(int absx, int absy, int objectid)[size=12pt];[/size] {[/quote]Remove the ; in it, I highlighted it in the quote.

Read full topic

BufferedWriter bw = null;

				new FileWriter("GlobalObjects.txt", true));
		bw.write("               makeGlobalObject("+absx+", "+absy+", "+objectid+", 0, 10);");
		bw.newLine();
		bw.flush();
	} catch (IOException ioe) {
		ioe.printStackTrace();
	} finally {
		if (bw != null) {
			try {
				bw.close();
			} catch (IOException ioe2) {
				sM("Error adding Object!");
			}
		}
	}

}[/code]
